description:
Super Star Shooter Classic is a time-based vertical shooting game that blends simple controls with score-focused gameplay. It is designed for short, concentrated sessions and features clean pixel-art visuals inspired by classic computer shooters.

■Game Modes
2-Minute Mode / 5-Minute Mode: Aim for the highest score within a fixed time limit. Each run is short, allowing repeated attempts and steady improvement.

■Gameplay
Move your ship, avoid enemy bullets, and destroy incoming foes. The game emphasizes accuracy, positioning, and pattern recognition. Controls are straightforward, making it accessible for beginners while offering enough depth for experienced players.

■Visual Style
The game uses sharp, retro-inspired pixel art reminiscent of early computer action games. Enemy patterns and boss attacks are designed to be readable, keeping the focus on score optimization and survivability.

■Competition and Replayability
An online leaderboard is included. Players can compare their scores globally and challenge themselves to climb the rankings through repeated runs.

■Recommended For
1.Players who enjoy short, focused arcade-style sessions.
2.Fans of classic vertical shooters and pixel-art presentation.
3.Those who like refining routes, improving accuracy, and competing through high-score play.
